name: Green Sphere
description:
A Red Ball clone I produced for fun in order to get back into developing. Post best times, bugs, and whatever else in the comments! 

Controls:

Arrow keys to move, R to restart the level, M to restart the game, ESCAPE to pause.

History:

v1.0 - release

v1.1 - added pause menu and level select, made pushing boxes easier, made Level 2 and Level 6 a lot easier

Known Bugs: 

- Sometimes, jumps don't register

- Sometimes, you spin very fast on restart/death

- Camera jitters slightly when moving on the ground

- Bigger resolutions can be laggier

- Sometimes, colliding with the corners of boxes can cause you to teleport to the other side

- Jumps counter is broken
